Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A significant correlation was observed between serum sFas levels and aspartate aminotransferase ( r = 0 . 613 , P < 0 . 01 ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| aspartate aminotransferase (ASAT) |

In this paragraph, the only disease entity mentioned is "aspartate aminotransferase (ASAT)". The paragraph is discussing a correlation between serum sFas levels and ASAT, but ASAT itself is the disease or condition being measured in this study.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

| Disease |
| --- |
| aspartate aminotransferase (aspartate aminotransferase, ASAT) |

In this paragraph, the only entity that clearly refers to a disease or condition is "aspartate aminotransferase (aspartate aminotransferase, ASAT)". The paragraph is discussing a correlation between serum sFas levels and ASAT levels, but ASAT is the disease or condition being measured in this study. The other entities mentioned, "serum" and "sfas", do not refer to diseases, but rather to the location and substance being measured, respectively.
